com.pump.graphics

Interface FillInstruction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GraphicInstruction, javax.swing.tree.TreeNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicFillInstruction, BasicShapeInstruction

    public interface FillInstruction
extends GraphicInstruction
    This instruction paints the fill of a shape.

    The paint() method should render something equivalent to what these lines of code produce:
    g = (Graphics2D)g.create();
    g.clip(getClipping());
    g.setTransform(getTransform());
    g.setPaint(getFillPaint());
    g.setComposite(AlphaComposite.getInstance(AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER,opacity));
    g.fill(getShape());

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Shape getClipping()
      Returns the optional clipping is not relative to the AffineTransform used.
      java.awt.Paint getFillPaint()
      Returns the paint to use.
      float getOpacity()
      The opacity to use.
      java.awt.Shape getShape()
      Returns the shape to paint.
      java.awt.geom.AffineTransform getTransform()
      Returns the transform to use.
      boolean isClipped()
      Return true if the clipping intersects this shape.
